page.title: 14Sarah Knight's Day
page.content: Up at 7 o'clock. Had a cup of tea and a biscuit. Up at 7.45 a.m. Dressed. Hot, so I wore sundress. Downstairs had breakfast. After breakfast washed, cleaned teeth, brushed hair. Put shoes on. Got ready for school. Helped with washing up. Made bed. Walked to school. Got to school 9.55 a.m. put chairs out. Handwriting. Maths till play. Practised three legged. English till lunchtime. After I had my sandwiches we went out to play. Practising races. Craft. Claire and I made a cat out of boxes. Stayed in at play and tidied up the classroom. Swimming. Played water polo. 3.30 p.m. Home time. Stacked chairs. Played in park. Up to Nan's for cup of tea. Home for tea - salad. After tea went to Chapel for practice for Anniversary. Home 8.00 p.m. and aunty and uncle called. To bed 9.15 p.m.
